range

Defined in src/util/Stream.js:196

Syntax

range

(
  • start
  • end
)
Stream

Summary

Creates a stream of numeric values from a start value (including) to an end value (excluding).

Parameters:

  • start Number

    Start value

  • end Number

    End value

Returns:

Stream:

Stream of iterated values

Example:

Seq.range(1, 10) // 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9
